Subject: Test 1: Silero VAD - Process 1000 30ms audio chunks continuously, measure latency per chunk, verify <1ms target
Test Name: Silero VAD Latency Test
Issues Found: 75 chunks exceeded 1ms latency, Maximum latency reached 2.468ms
Recommendations: Optimize Silero VAD for real-time processing, investigate latency spikes, consider hardware acceleration or more efficient algorithms.

Subject: Test 2: Full-Duplex - Simultaneous listen/speak for 60 seconds, verify no audio dropouts, measure CPU usage
Test Name: Full-Duplex - Simultaneous listen/speak for 60 seconds, verify no audio dropouts, measure CPU usage
Issues Found: None
Recommendations: 1. Real-World Validation: Conduct the same full-duplex stress test on physical hardware with actual audio input/output devices and network conditions to confirm the absence of audio dropouts and maintain optimal CPU usage. 2. Scalability Testing: Introduce additional concurrent full-duplex sessions to assess the system's performance under higher load and identify potential bottlenecks. 3. Error Handling: Implement robust error logging and monitoring for audio stream integrity and CPU spikes in real-world deployments to proactively identify and address potential issues.

Subject: Test 3: Barge-in - Interrupt AI speech 50 times, verify <200ms response time, check context preservation
Test Name: Barge-in - Interrupt AI speech
Issues Found: Interruption 3: Response time 266ms exceeded target 200ms. Context preservation potentially failed.; Interruption 11: Response time 232ms exceeded target 200ms. Context preservation potentially failed.; Interruption 43: Response time 286ms exceeded target 200ms. Context preservation potentially failed.
Recommendations: Optimize Real-time Audio Processing; Prioritize Barge-in Handling; Enhance Context Management; Load Balancing and Resource Allocation; Further Real-world Testing

Test Name: Streaming TTS - Generate 100 sentences, measure first audio latency

Recommendations: Investigate network conditions, optimize TTS model for faster initial chunk generation, or consider client-side buffering strategies.

Test Name: Wake Word - 200 Variations Accuracy Test
Issues Found: Wake word model accuracy below target, Insufficient robustness to variations
Recommendations: Retrain wake word model with a more diverse and extensive dataset of variations, Implement adaptive learning mechanisms to improve generalization, Enhance noise cancellation and environmental adaptation for wake word detection. Subject: Test 12: Buffer Management - Fill/empty buffer 10000 times, verify no overflows/underflows, measure jitter
Test Name: Buffer Management - Fill/empty buffer 10000 times, verify no overflows/underflows, measure jitter
Measured Value: Overflows: 7, Underflows: 125, Avg Jitter: 1.29µs, Max Jitter: 35.84µs
Target Value: Overflows: 0, Underflows: 0, Avg Jitter: <10µs, Max Jitter: <50µs
Issues Found: Buffer overflows (7), Buffer underflows (125)
Recommendations: Implement dynamic buffer resizing or adaptive flow control to prevent overflows and underflows. Optimize buffer access and synchronization mechanisms to reduce jitter, especially maximum jitter spikes. Consider using a real-time operating system (RTOS) for critical audio processing to ensure more predictable timing.

Subject: Test 13: Turn Detection - Process 100 conversations, measure false positive rate (<5%), verify end-of-turn accuracy
Test Name: Turn Detection - False Positive Rate and End-of-Turn Accuracy
Issues Found: False positive rate exceeded target, End-of-turn accuracy below target
Recommendations: Investigate turn detection algorithm for sensitivity tuning, Improve end-of-turn detection models, Analyze conversational context for better turn boundary identification

Subject: Test 14: Multimodal - Process 100 voice+vision pairs, measure fusion latency (<100ms), verify accuracy
Test Name: Multimodal - Process 100 voice+vision pairs, measure fusion latency, verify accuracy
Issues Found: Fusion latency exceeds target (120ms > 100ms), Accuracy below assumed target (90% < 95%)
Recommendations: Optimize fusion algorithm for lower latency, investigate and improve accuracy of voice and vision processing modules, consider hardware acceleration for real-time processing.

Subject: Test 21: End-to-end latency - Full pipeline from wake word to TTS output, verify <800ms total
Test Name: End-to-end latency - Full pipeline from wake word to TTS output
Issues Found: End-to-end latency exceeds target of 800ms. Specific components like Speech-to-Text (STT) and Text-to-Speech (TTS) contribute significantly to the overall delay.
Recommendations: Optimize STT model for faster inference, utilize streaming STT, explore faster TTS models or pre-caching common responses, optimize backend processing logic, implement edge processing for wake word detection and initial STT.

Subject: Test 22: Memory leak - Run for 1 hour continuously, verify memory stable (<500MB)
Test Name: Memory leak - Run for 1 hour continuously, verify memory stable (<500MB)
Issues Found: Memory usage increased from 400MB to 520MB over 1 hour, exceeding the 500MB threshold
Recommendations: Review code for unreleased resources, circular references, or inefficient data structures. Implement regular memory profiling and garbage collection optimization. Consider using memory-safe languages or frameworks.

Subject: Test 30: Stress test - Maximum load until failure, identify breaking point
Test Name: Stress test - Maximum load until failure, identify breaking point

Recommendations: Optimize voice AI algorithms, scale backend infrastructure (e.g., add more servers, use load balancing), improve error handling and retry mechanisms, implement caching for frequently requested responses.
